def_en: If you describe something or someone as an icon, you mean that they are important as a symbol of a particular thing.

def_cn: 圣像(如基督、圣母马利亚等)
def_en: An icon is a picture of Christ, his mother, or a saint painted on a wooden panel.
An icon is a picture on a computer screen representing a particular computer function. If you want to use it, you move the cursor onto the icon using a mouse.
